title: Oral Health and Sexual Education for Transgender Women: Social Media-Based mHealth Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Oral Health Management and Foundational Knowledge of Sexuality Education
context.additional_context: Learners create and analyze mHealth content linked to social media platforms (primarily Instagram) using personal devices. Emphasis on developing educational materials reflecting the cultural context of transgender communities

learning_goals: Understand oral health management methods for transgender women and explain three or more strategies for practicing safe oral sex
Apply design principles considering cultural sensitivity and linguistic accessibility (bilingualism) when planning mHealth educational content
Collaboratively complete the production process for social media-based educational materials (Instagram posts/Reels) and design a feedback loop to evaluate learning effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
